channel.title: kildare on d2h.net: flotsam, jetsam, & lagan
channel.description: Recent content in kildare on d2h.net: flotsam, jetsam, & lagan

item.title: a new breakfast beverage, brigid’s well, rock of cashel
item.description: no “madame–baby” wake-up call this morning (i guess mr charming realized that madame was already taking a shower when he called) but a bit of re-packing before breakfast as today we are relocating to tralee in county kerry. having learnt from yesterday’s breakfast i appear on the scene 15min early and order coffee (for me) and tea (for mrs d) along with my cooked breakfast — ms rough charme tries to force me to use the german breakfast menu but i stubbornly insists on using the original.
